Nel Nuovo Galles del Sud, Roz, suo marito Harold e il loro figlio Tom vivono vicino alla spiaggia. Lil, che ÃƒÂ¨ vedova, vive nelle vicinanze con il figlio Ian. Roz e Lil sono grandi amiche, e lo sono anche Tom e Ian.....

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/6180/4e6.gif[/img]

Lil (Naomi Watts) and Roz (Robin Wright) are two lifelong friends, having grown up together as neighbors in an idyllic beach town. As adults, their sons have developed a friendship as strong as that which binds their mothers. One summer, all four are confronted by simmering emotions that have been mounting between them.........
